channel.title: Taking Runescape logo off?
channel.description: Hi, I am trying to take the Runescape logo off of my client load screen. It is not part of the background as I have tried editing over it but it isn't even on the Background picture. Any idea how to remove it?

item.title: Taking Runescape logo off?
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

i think you got pk planet v6 client (because i readed that in another post from you)
here is a little tutorial to do this

[ol][li]you need to download tom’s cache suite http://db.tt/gEV4DnRT[/li]
[li]unpack the rar file and then open it. Click on file>Load cache. Select your cache folder [/li]
[li]Click on View/Edit image archieves then click on ok[/li]
[li]Click on Logo.dat then in the right column click on 0.dat and you will see the runescape logo[/li]
[li]Click on the minus(-) under that column[/li]
[li]Click on Save Archive[/li]
[li]Close Tom’s cache suite[/li][/ol]

and there you go

Read full topic
